胰腺癌重编程神经细胞以促进生长胰腺癌是通过与神经系统的连接助长的。这是由德国癌症研究中心（DKFZ）和海德堡干细胞技术与实验医学研究所（HI-STEM）的科学家报道的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/pancreatic-cancer-reprograms-nerve-cells-cells-cells-cells-to-fuel-growth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/pancreatic-cancer-reprograms-nerve-cells-cells-cells-cells-to-fuel-growth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d345A491-40CA-43B8-9CCE-6520E2994CF7 Mon, 17 Feb 2025 13:23:58 -0500 Pancreatic cancer reprograms nerve cells to fuel growth
AI工具加快了患者筛查的心力衰竭试验根据JAMA发表的一项新研究，由大规模的杨百翰研究人员领导，人工智能（AI）可以迅速筛查患者进行临床试验入学率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/ai-tool-speeds-up-patient-screening-for-for-for-for-failure-trials.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/ai-tool-speeds-up-patient-screening-for-for-for-for-failure-trials.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4793ABC6-5B64-4850-A52A-CAAAA3E3E4565CE Mon, 17 Feb 2025 13:09:42 -0500 AI tool speeds up patient screening for heart failure trials
开创性的ALS平台试验加速了研究和药物测试肌萎缩性侧索硬化症（ALS）是一种致命的神经退行性疾病，几乎没有治疗选择。自2018年以来，马萨诸塞州总医院（MGH）的Sean M. Healey＆AMG ALS中心（MASCACHUSETTS综合医院（MGH））是Mass General Brigham Healthcare System的创始成员在ALS中，使用共享试验基础架构和安慰剂数据同时测试多种药物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/groundbreaking-als-als-als-als-platform-trial-accelerates-research-research-and-drug-testing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/groundbreaking-als-als-als-platform-trial-accelerates-research-research-and-drug-testing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f0aad8ae-cd43-4127-b0ef-4E9767D44405F Mon, 17 Feb 2025 13:01:51 -0500 Groundbreaking ALS platform trial accelerates research and drug testing
研究将Sucrase缺陷与增加IBS风险和严重症状联系起来Sucrase-Isomaltase（Si）是一种肠道酶，对于消化饮食碳水化合物，尤其是蔗糖和淀粉至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/study-links-sucrase-defects-to-increast--incred-incred-incred-increased-ibs-risks-and-severe-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/study-links-sucrase-defects-to-increast--increard-ibs-risks-risk-and-severe-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5D530632-9E0D-4D10-9951-6894CEE3B996 Mon, 17 Feb 2025 12:54:18 -0500 Study links sucrase defects to increased IBS risk and severe symptoms
研究为大脑进化提供了新的灯光在一项发表在科学上的新研究中，比利时研究小组探讨了控制基因活性的遗传转换如何定义跨物种的脑细胞类型。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/study-sheds-new-new-light-on-brain-vorlose.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/study-sheds-new-new-light-on-on-brain-volution.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=22bc46b5-f393-4e33-918d-23acade295b1 Mon, 17 Feb 2025 12:42:32 -0500 Study sheds new light on brain evolution
伊卡汀软胶胶囊为肝细胞癌患者提供了新的希望宣布了Acta Materia Medica Journal的新出版物。伊卡林蛋白（ICA）是一种从epimedium属植物中提取的丙二酰氟氟叶植物天然产物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/icaritin-softgel-capsules-offer-new-new-hope-for-hope-for-hope-hope-hepatocellular-carcinomal-carcinoma patients.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/icaritin-softgel-capsules-offer-new-hope-new-hope-for-hope-for-hope-hepatocalular-carcinomal-carcinomal-patients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fa6a20ec-607D-4F5A-89BD-65EE1727AAA23 Mon, 17 Feb 2025 12:32:19 -0500 Icaritin softgel capsules offer new hope for hepatocellular carcinoma patients
民意调查显示，父母对青少年的观点对于可能对诸如痤疮疤痕或变色牙齿等问题具有自我意识的青少年，非手术化妆程序是解决其关注点越来越流行的方式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/poll-reveals-parents-parents-parents-parents-views-on-teens-getting-cosmetic-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/poll-reveals-parents-parents-parents-parents-views-on-teens-getting-cosmetic-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=B2C29AB3-67EC-4F5C-A93D-D4756D825E50 Mon, 17 Feb 2025 12:28:38 -0500 Poll reveals parents' views on teens getting cosmetic treatments
新的AI医疗保健和神经调节中心将在日内瓦推出日内瓦大学医院（HUG），日内瓦州卫生与流动性系（DSM）和Wyss Bio和Neuro Engineering中心签订了三方协议，以创建人工智能（AI）参考枢纽的三方协议其就职典礼将于今年下半年就职典礼。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/new-ai-hub-for-healthcare-healthcare-and-neuromodulation-set-to-launch-innunch-in-geneva.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/new-ai-hub-for-healthcare-healthcare-and-neuromodulation-set-to-launch-inunch-innunch-in-geneva.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ffd02060-9A6F-47D2-AE08-EEC4F176A3FD1 Mon, 17 Feb 2025 12:23:00 -0500 New AI hub for healthcare and neuromodulation set to launch in Geneva
新书突出了男人和男孩面临的复杂斗争其中包括与身体形象，父亲身份和性关系相关的。他的最新著作《当前的男人和男孩面临的问题》也认为，男人努力谈判有害的男性气概，而不包括在性别的对话中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/new-book-highlights-the-complex-struggles-face--face-by-men-and-boys.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/new-book-highlights-the-complex-struggles-face--face-by-men-and-boys.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=736d8ba7-d828-461d-9493-7083c952aa4d Mon, 17 Feb 2025 12:16:59 -0500 New book highlights the complex struggles faced by men and boys
大理石算法解码大脑活动以识别普遍的心理模式在盲人和大象的寓言中，几个盲人描述了他们正在触摸的大象的另一部分 - 尖锐的象牙，柔软的躯干或宽阔的腿 - 对动物的真实本性不同意。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/marble-algorithm-decodes-decodes-brain-activity-to-sideify-nidefify-univsal-mental-mental-mental-patterns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/marble-algorithm-decodes-decodes-brain-activity-to-ridefitive-to-iendify-universal-mental-mental-mental-portalns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2391cbf2-1f64-4e94-8c68-72567ab38a38 Mon, 17 Feb 2025 11:51:00 -0500 MARBLE algorithm decodes brain activity to identify universal mental patterns
